text: Vony ochikuyutʹ toho, shcho trapytʹsya z vamy. Yakshcho pryyde do vas vid Allaha peremoha, to vony skazhutʹ: «Khiba zh my ne buly z vamy?» A yakshcho peremoha bude na botsi neviruyuchykh, to vony skazhutʹ: «Khiba zh my ne dopomahaly vam ta ne zakhyshchaly vas vid viruyuchykh?» Allah rozsudytʹ mizh vamy v Denʹ Voskresinnya i Allah nikoly ne daruye neviruyuchym perevahy nad viruyuchymy
